attributes.action: Allow all 16-18 year olds to vote in the snap election called by Theresa May
attributes.additional_details: This is a huge portion of society which is interested in expressing their opinions. We deserve a say in how Brexit will be carried out and run as it is our future as much as any other voters'.
attributes.background: Theresa May has just expressed will in holding a general election later this year. In the EU referendum, 16-18 year olds were denied the vote. Now, by calling an early election, she is delaying the opportunity for this group to have a say yet again.
